			[1553] tabpanel 'Details'
				[1561] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1564] list ''
					[1565] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText "Our slippers are retailed directly by manufacturer. Beside the good quality, we focus on the characteristic of stylish. The slipper is not only a shoe, but also a choice of life style. Simple but generosity. Release your feet and show your generosity life attitude at the same time. It will make life more harmonious between lovers and also a better way for guest entertainment. Make you and people around you enjoy a happy life!The best quality you had never see before!✔Product Profile Upper Vamp: Stripe JerseyInner Vamp: Strip Coral Fleece FabricMid Sole: Strip Coral Fleece FabricLining: 1 cm Memory SpongeSole: SuedeSize: 11 inch for men/8 inch for women✔Please note: 1.NOT WATERPROOF, IN CASE IT IS SLIPPED, PLEASE KEEP THE SHOE SOLE AWAY FROM WATER 2. Due to the light and screen difference, the item's color may be slightly different from the pictures. 3. Please allow 1-2 cm differences due to manual measurement.Package:Couple Suit(One for men/One for women)✔If you are satisfied with our products, leaving your suggestion will be welcome to help other customers make choice.So your opinion will be very important both for other customers and for our improvement."
					[1567] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'DESIGN: Buy One Get One Free! Red for Women Size: 7-8 M US. Simple look with stripe on vamp show the generous style. Easy on/off, hands-free, slip-on style with a low heel collar, these slippers could match well with your loungewear, pajamas, robes etc.'
					[1569] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'SUPERIOR WORKMANSHIP: Smooth stitching and well made workmanship, which make them more endurable. The slipper lined with high-density memory foam that really molds to your feet! Washable, both hand and machine wash.(Please Tile Drying)'
					[1571] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'CHARACTERISTIC AND COMFORT: The sole is made by suede, soft, light and silence and provide friction. Anti slip, but please keep the floor dry without water(Suitable for solid wood floor and carpet). Coral fleece fabric with memory sponge make your feet comfort, warm but not hot.'
					[1573] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: 100% RISK-FREE PURCHASE! Backed with Money Back Guarantee and the friendliest Customer Service.'
					[1575] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'AFTER-SALE SERVICE: All your after-sale needs will be cared of within 24 hours!'

step_data.thought: I need to check if the Memory Foam slippers are on sale. The current page shows the details of a specific Memory Foam slipper. I will check the price indicated on this page to determine if it is on sale.
